# Model 1
```{r}
model <- c("Baseline",
           "Two classes")

dataset <- c("1",
             "2")

convergence <- c("10 / 10",
                 "9 / 10")

estimation <- c("10 / 10",
                "9 / 10")

df <- data.frame(model,
                 dataset,
                 convergence,
                 estimation)

names(df) <- c("Model",
               "Dataset",
               "Convergence stability",
               "Estimation stability")

flextable(df)
```
